page.title: 06COUNCIL HOUSES
page.content:
Unlike other houses in Sanday the council houses were built by the council and are houses for renting. There are{ten council houses,}four one storey houses for older people and six two storey houses for families.
In the{four one-storey houses}there are: one bedroom, a closet, a kitchen and a sitting room all in one. In the {six two-storey houses}there are three bedrooms, an airing cupboard, and a bathroom. Downstairs the rooms are; sitting room, kitchen, toilet, cupboard, and a storage room.
The houses are{centrally heated}from one{electric storage heater. Hot water is obtained by an{immersion heater.
